directions: Whisk yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, lemon peel, and celery seeds in large bowl to blend. Add remaining ingredients; toss to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Cover; chill. Toss before serving.)
ingredients: 4 cups thinly sliced green cabbage (from about 1/2 large head)
title: Enlightened Traditional Coleslaw
